segments.text: What's the weather like in your city ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In the summer it gets very hot . The temperature is between often 37 and 40 centigrade . When it is hot we often get rains . The winters are drier .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The summer temperature usually often reaches about 20 or25 in my city . The rain falls mostly in the winter . And we often get snow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are the temperatures in winter ? In my city it is about 15 or 20 degrees .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: In winter temperature often falls to zero at night temperature can be below that . The streets are often icing in the morning . With high such temperatures you must get some thunderstorms .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , we do . In the middle of summer there can be found storms every day usually in the afternoon . I heard your city has a lot of fog , is that true ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We do have a few fog days in winter . But I would not say we have a lot of fogs . The sky are usually clearly in your city , are they ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , they are like I said we have thunderstorms . But each one usually last a few hours . Then the skys are clear again .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you ever had snow in your city ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My grandmother said there was snow once when she was a child . But my parents and I never see it outside of my city .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The river in my city sometime freeze over . People go ice-skating on it . In summer people go boating on the river . But few people go swimming because it is not very clean .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: As you know , my city is on the coast.the water is also not clean . But people still go swimming all year around . I prefer to sand bath on the beach when the weather is hot and sunning .
segments.speaker: S2
